Title: Authorizes the city school district of the city of Salamanca to establish a reserve fund for federal impact aid in the event such aid is reduced
Summary: Authorizes the city school district of the city of Salamanca to establish a reserve fund for federal impact aid in the event such aid is reduced.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize the board of education of the Salamanca city school district to establish a federal impact aid reserve fund in the event federal impact aid is reduced
